content: I added a couple of lines of code to the ig-pub spreadsheet parser to add a SD.description from spreadsheet "meta" page. Is there a reason was (presumably) removed or why not there? can I commit the change? Makes {{site.data.structuredefinitions.[id].description}} + markdown really handy for templating.
Also has the markdown officially changed to commonmark + tables but no html?
and no, we haven't officially changed markdown, nor have I changed the tooling.
Just speculating since there was an empty line in the code where it fit.
just copied the preceding 2 lines and change "date" to "description"

I fixed GF#14313 and GF#13395 on my local build and described the fixes in the trackers. If they look OK to IG-pub gurus (no side effects so far for me) then can I commit after the for comment ballot is out?
